name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Deadlands
storyline: The cataclysmic conclusion to the Gates of Oblivion year-long adventure begins! Explore a volatile, ever-changing realm of Oblivion and the bizarre city of Fargrave, gather mysterious new allies, and uncover Mehrunes Dagon’s ultimate plans for Tamriel. In The Elder Scrolls Online: Deadlands, it’s up to you to stop the Daedric Prince’s infernal schemes, 800 years before the events of The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion.
summary: Experience the cataclysmic conclusion to the Gates of Oblivion year-long adventure in The Elder Scrolls Online: Deadlands. Explore new worlds, discover strange new allies, and bring destruction to Oblivion itself in this new zone and story DLC.
